# Getting Logged In

## Getting Started

In order to use a chromebook, we need to have a google account.  If you already have one, then just use it to sign into your chromebook.  If not, no worries, we can create one right now.

  1. First we must get to the right webpage.  Type in the following URL:https://accounts.google.com/SignUp?hl=en, or you can search up "How to sign up for google."  Select the option titled "Create your Google account" highlighted in red below:
  
![getting logged in 1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/28197711/26593259/4c911c24-4518-11e7-887e-c42074b107fb.png)

  That should take you to the following page and step 2.
